Hydras:

Hydras typed some buttons, he felt un easy and he liked to check 
where his troops where. He looked all predacons signals and picked 
two, he frowned his forehead and open comlink to Maxima "Maxima... 
here is Hydras." 


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> She just wanted to get to the Cons, learn about them, then 
continue from 
> there. She smiled, barely noticable, how Hydras would like this. 
Hopefully. More 
> troops is usually a good thing. Especially if they are Decepticons.
